logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: Added logo :)

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: Added basic debugger, converted rdf:about into rdf:ID in rim.owl Added initial reference handler for CMET hierarchies in cmet2owl.xsl

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: Added transformation for checking range, domain and restriction constraints Corrected rdf:ID in RIM ObjectProperties

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: Corrected class attributes generation, multiple superclasses and super-properties CMET->OWL conversion can be applied also to HMDs

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: Nearly completed conversion of CMETs. There are still issues with URI name conflicts and with how to handle "hasValue"

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: corrected two typos in cmet2owl.xsl

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: started working on CMETs

logentry.msg: HL7: added RIM Packages in class hierarchy

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: added initial trasformation for CMET_container

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: completed lowering Datatype model from OWL Full to OWL DL

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: added first (non functional) prototypes for HMD and CMET ontology generation. Re-started working on Datatypes, need to be ported to OWL DL

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: Updated input files and Makefile Initial cmet and hmd transformations

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: HL7: Fixed "SC" datatype, added handler for UML-style sets Elements in instance messages such as "BAG<AD>" are to be converted into "BAG_AD_"

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: Added missing type "SC", fixed incorrect placement of cardinality constraints. The ontology now is correctly validated.

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: clean_dt.xsl: now it produces an ontology to be used instead of the original RIMDatatype

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: Added datatypes adapting the work of Samson Tu Added trasformation to fix datatypes Added Makefile (for internal use)

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: Base RIM ontology generator nearly completed. Added attributes and associations handlers.

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: Ontology: added initial datatype and associations support. Still missing datatype definitions and ObjectProperty ids from associations

logentry.author: carenini

logentry.author: carenini
logentry.msg: Conversion to OWL now produces correct class hierarchies and correctly uses namespaces. Produced ontology loads into Mindswap SWOOP.
